channel.title: Help Nearly Finished (client does not connect!)
channel.description:
K so here is the problem... 1. I have port forwarded 2. i have changed the ip of my client to 192.628.1.** (**= my ip not my default) 3. i have compiled 4. server works 5. client works on computer with server installed 6. (the error) when logging on with SAME client on DIFFERENT computer.... it comes up as "error cannot connect to server"... i have tried everything.
please help.. i am 99.99% done.
Thank you. Zaknai -----------------------------------------
update: Fixed please vistit http://www.iceyscape.smfnew.com and download this client at http://www.mediafire.com/?mzidmkiylvy thanks
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UPDATE: NOT WORKING LINK SORRY BUT I FAIL =( i will have it up soon

@zaknai wrote:

I fixed it!! I dont know how but i did! for those of you who want to check it out go to http://www.mediafire.com/?mzidmkiylvy or watch http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WD5r1d5nRHI thanks for all your help!

coe to the website too http://www.iceyscape.smfnew.com

thanks again! for making my dream a reality!!

item.title: Help Nearly Finished (client does not connect!)
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

1.)Portforward
2.)Get no-ip and make a host
3.)Change the ip in your CLIENT and SOURCE, multiple places in there shouldn’t take long to notice
4.)Put your server on and login (after compiling)

Read full topic
